title: Which HP i3 10th generation laptop is the best? - Quora

response.answer_text: we will suggest you a most popular and demanding laptop of i3 10th generation configuration in the laptop market. HP 14s cf3047TU Processor: 1.2GHz Intel i3-1005G1 10th Gen processorMemory: 4GB DDR4 RAMStorage: 256GB SSDDisplay: 14-inch screenGraphics: Intel UHD GraphicsOS: Windows 10 Home operating systemWeight: 1.47kg laptop Pros Fast booting due to SSD Good battery back up 6 to 7 hr Design is thin and lightweight Value for money Cons Poor webcam if you want to get more detailed information about the specification you are looking for please have a look at techsupgade(.com) Please Upvote, if found helpful Thank you

Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i 10th GenHP 14 10th Gen Intel Core i3 ProcessorLenovo Ideapad Slim 3i Intel Core i5 10th GenThis is for all-rounder activity. For now, these are the best laptop which has core i3 10 gen processor. HP recently is not producing many laptops of core i3 10 Gen. So best of luck from choosing among them. And I would prefer the AMD processor for now as Ryzen 3 and 5 are offering better performance than the intel processor is giving now. But if the 11th gen processor will offer more than an AMD processor then I will change my preferred. So until then you should probably wait or go with the AMD processor now. I hope you understood the problem. Have a nice day.
